meanings.sent1: The booming thunder scared the little puppy.
meanings.sent2: The booming music filled the room with its powerful sound.
meanings.sent3: The booming voice of the tiny kitten surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The booming laughter echoed through the empty hallways.
meanings.sent5: The booming drumbeat set the rhythm for the entire performance.

meanings.sent1: The booming population of the city led to crowded streets.
meanings.sent2: The booming construction industry created many job opportunities.
meanings.sent3: The booming plant in the garden seemed to reach for the sky.
meanings.sent4: The booming demand for the new product caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent5: The booming economy brought prosperity to the small town.

meanings.sent1: The booming business attracted investors from all over.
meanings.sent2: The booming real estate market made it hard to find affordable housing.
meanings.sent3: The booming bakery always had a line out the door.
meanings.sent4: The booming career of the young actor was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent5: The booming sales figures exceeded all expectations.
